    key: "Xc9aQTKyoNQ="

      oneof: {
        potential_conflict: true
        options: {
          key: "ZnMYW-0YN9c="
          value: {
            struct: {
              fields: {
                key: "name"
                value: {
                  oneof: {
                    potential_conflict: true
                    options: {
                      key: "0ChzXURDSRY="
                      value: {
                        primitive: {
                          string_value: {}
                        }
                      }

                    options: {
                      key: "kqruZ1VXnrw="
                      value: {
                        primitive: {
                          bool_value: {}
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
              fields: {
                key: "age"
                value: {
                  primitive: {
                    int64_value: {}
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
        options: {
          key: "DbM2pDwZ79k="
          value: {
            optional: {
              none: {}
            }
          }
